title: Personalized Language Education Design Utilizing Generative AI

context.prior_knowledge: Basic digital tool proficiency and practical experience in language education fields
context.additional_context: A constrained technological environment centered on smartphones, requiring real-time interaction and the use of generative AI tools.

learning_goals: Learners can design personalized language education content using generative AI
Learners can identify ethical issues (such as bias, information reliability) that may arise when applying generative AI and propose response strategies
Learners can revise and improve AI-supported language education programs three or more times by applying an iterative design process

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
